span.span: Represents a package of compressed files in the zip archive format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `mode` 参数设置为 ，则流必须支持读取。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading. 如果 `mode` 参数设置为 ，则流必须支持写入。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support writing. 如果 `mode` 参数设置为 ，则流必须支持读取、写入和查找。If the `mode` parameter is set to , the stream must support reading, writing, and seeking.

summary.span: 在 zip 存档中创建空项。

span.span: Creates an empty entry in the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry (string entryName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntry(string entryName) cil managed
Public Function CreateEntry (entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry
public: System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveEntry ^ CreateEntry(System::String ^ entryName);
member this.CreateEntry : string -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: entryName
param.span: 相对于存档的根的路径指定了要创建项目的名称。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

summary.span: 创建在 zip 存档中有指定路径和项名的空项。

span.span: Creates an empty entry that has the specified path and entry name in the zip archive.

returns.span: 在 zip 存档中的空项。

span.span: An empty entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 `entryName` 字符串应反映要在 zip 存档中创建的条目的相对路径。The `entryName` string should reflect the relative path of the entry you want to create within the zip archive. 您提供的字符串没有限制。There is no restriction on the string you provide. 但是，如果未将其格式化为相对路径，则会创建该条目，但当你提取 zip 存档的内容时，可能会出现异常。However, if it is not formatted as a relative path, the entry is created, but you may get an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. 如果存档中已存在具有指定路径和名称的条目，则将创建具有相同路径和名称的第二个条目。If an entry with the specified path and name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with the same path and name. 新项的属性的值设置为当前时间。The value of the property for the new entry is set to the current time. 使用基础压缩算法的默认压缩级别压缩条目。The entry is compressed using the default compression level of the underlying compression algorithm. 如果要指定不同的压缩级别，请使用 方法。If you want to specify a different compression level, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用流创建项并对其进行写入。The following example shows how to create an entry and write to it by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)]

is .

Public Function CreateEntry (entryName As String, compressionLevel As CompressionLevel) As ZipArchiveEntry

member this.CreateEntry : string * System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: entryName
param.span: 相对于存档的根的路径指定了要创建项目的名称。

span.span: A path, relative to the root of the archive, that specifies the name of the entry to be created.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 指示创建项时是否强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

summary.span: 创建在 zip 存档中有指定项名和压缩级别的空项。

span.span: Creates an empty entry that has the specified entry name and compression level in the zip archive.

returns.span: 在 zip 存档中的空项。

span.span: An empty entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 `entryName` 字符串应反映要在 zip 存档中创建的条目的相对路径。The `entryName` string should reflect the relative path of the entry you want to create within the zip archive. 您提供的字符串没有限制。There is no restriction on the string you provide. 但是，如果未将其格式化为相对路径，则会创建该条目，但当你提取 zip 存档的内容时，可能会出现异常。However, if it is not formatted as a relative path, the entry is created, but you may get an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. 如果存档中已经存在具有指定名称的条目，则将使用相同的名称创建另一个条目。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with the same name. 新项的属性的值设置为当前时间。The value of the property for the new entry is set to the current time. `compressionLevel`如果希望尽可能压缩文件，请将参数设置为 。Set the `compressionLevel` parameter to if you want the file to be compressed as much as possible. `compressionLevel` 仅当你担心压缩操作不会为你的方案迅速完成时，才将参数设置为。Set the `compressionLevel` parameter to only if you are concerned that the compression operation will not complete quickly enough for your scenario. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建具有最佳压缩级别的条目。The following example shows how to create an entry with the optimal compression level. 它还使用流写入新条目。It also writes to the new entry by using a stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法完成写入存档并释放由该对象使用的所有资源 。This method finishes writing the archive and releases all resources used by the object. 除非使用 构造函数重载构造对象并将其 `leaveOpen` 参数设置为，否则 `true` 所有基础流都将关闭，并且不再可用于后续写入操作。Unless you construct the object by using the constructor overload and set its `leaveOpen` parameter to `true`, all underlying streams are closed and no longer available for subsequent write operations. 使用的此实例完成后 ，调用 以释放此实例使用的所有资源。When you are finished using this instance of , call to release all resources used by this instance. 你应消除对此实例的进一步引用 ，以便垃圾回收器可以回收实例的内存，而不是使其处于活动状态以完成。You should eliminate further references to this instance so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory of the instance instead of keeping it alive for finalization. 调用 方法，该方法包含用于释放托管资源和非托管资源的代码。 calls the method, which contains the code to release managed and unmanaged resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示完成存档的写入并释放未托管和托管资源； 则仅释放未托管资源。

span.span: to finish writing the archive and release unmanaged and managed resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 由 和 方法调用，以释放 类的当前实例使用的未托管资源，并选择性地完成存档的写入和释放托管资源。

span.span: Called by the and methods to release the unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class, and optionally finishes writing the archive and releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `disposing` 设置为 `true` ，则所有基础流都将关闭，并且不再可用于后续写入操作，除非你使用 构造函数重载构造对象并将其 `leaveOpen` 参数设置为 `true` 。If `disposing` is set to `true`, all underlying streams are closed and no longer available for subsequent write operations, unless you construct the object by using the constructor overload and set its `leaveOpen` parameter to `true`. 此方法只能由公共方法 和方法调用 ; 不要直接调用此方法。This method is called only by the public and methods; do not call this method directly. 实现 dispose 模式时， 应按如下方式使用方法的布尔参数：When you implement the dispose pattern, the Boolean parameter of the method should be used as follows: - 当前对象的方法应在 将布尔参数设置为的情况调用， `true` 以释放托管资源和非托管资源。The method of the current object should call with the Boolean parameter set to `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources. - 当前对象的方法应调用 ，并将布尔参数设置为， `false` 以仅释放非托管资源。The method of the current object should call with the Boolean parameter set to `false` to release only unmanaged resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可检索条目的整个集合。Use the property to retrieve the entire collection of entries. 使用 方法可按名称检索单个条目。Use the method to retrieve a single entry by name. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开 zip 存档并循环访问项的集合。The following example shows how to open a zip archive and iterate through the collection of entries. remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建类的实例时，请为属性指定一个值 。You specify a value for the property when you create an instance of the class. 使用 或 构造函数提供属性的值 。Use the or constructor to provide a value for the property.
